title: MDP Statement on Governor Snyder's Long-Awaited Response to Flint's Water Crisis (Michigan Democratic Party)
text: ( Source : Michigan Democratic Party ) Roll Call : Rep. Adam Zemke State Representative Adam Zemke ( District 55) is serving his second term representing parts of Washtenaw County . Zemke is a strong and promising advocate for education reform
